name: function 5
MENU
info:
IN TAB 'MENU', THERE ARE 4 OPTIONS FOR USER TO SELECT TO MOVE TO CORRESPONDING TABS
1. PRODUCT INFORMATION: THIS TAB HAS IMAGES OF PRODUCT AND DETAILS OF THE MACHINE.
2. DATA RECEIVING: THIS TAB CONTAINS REALITY DATA TRANSMITTED FROM THE MACHINE IN ORDER TO LET USER SUPERVISE THEIR MACHINE'S STATUS.
3. CONTACT US: THIS TAB INCLUDES INFORMATION OF PRODUCER.
4. LOG OUT: USER CAN LOG OUT THEIR ACCOUNT IF THEY DO NOT WANT TO CONTINUE BEING ONLINE.

LOGIN
info:
FUNCTION 1 AND 2 ARE USED FOR CHECKING THE LOGIN CONDITION.
FUNCTION 1 WILL RECEIVE MESSAGE FROM NODE "FORM"
THEN FUNCTION WILL CHECK THE USERNAME AND PASSWORD THAT ARE ENTERED:
IF USERNAME = admin PASSWORD = admin, WEB WILL MOVE TO TAB MENU.
OTHERWISE, IT WILL NOTIFY TO USER UNSUCCESFUL LOGIN.

name: PRODUCT INFORMATION
info: CONTAINING PRODUCT INFORMATION: OVERVIEW AND INNER GIF IMAGES, DISCRIPTION ABOUT EACH PART OF MACHINE AND HOW IT WORKS.

name: DATA RECEIVING
info:
CONTAINING ALL DATA FROM MACHINE'S SENSORS: TEMPERATURE, HUMIDITY, AMOUNT OF FOOD AND WATER LEFT. 
MOREOVER, USER CAN USE A SWITCH TO TURN ON OR OFF THE MISTING FUNCTION MAUALLY.

name: NODE-RED -> WOKWI
info:
ACTION OF TURNING ON/OFF THE SWITCH WILL SEND A MESSAGE THROUGHOUT MQTT PROTOCOL TO WOKWI.
THIS MESSAGE IS SAVED AS A VARIABLE IN WOKWI PROGRAM AND USED TO ACTIVATE FUNCTION IN WOKWI

name: WOKWI -> NODE-RED
info: DATA IN WOKWI IS TRANSMITTED TO NODE-RED DASHBOARD TO ANALYSE AND VISUALIZED IN NODE-RED UI

name: THINGSPEAK TO NODE-RED
info:
TAKING DATA SAVED IN THINGSPEAK BY USING NODE HTTP REQUEST
THEN, NODE FUNTION IS DESIGNED TO TAKE THIS DATA AND TRANSMIT TO NODE CHART TO VISUALIZE IT IN LINE CHART

name: BUTTON TO MOVE TO OTHER TABS
